description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 13 (Tree Protection), 17 (Details of Green Roofs) and 18 (Demolition and Construction Management Plan) of planning permission ref: 11068/APP/2020/1586 dated 03-11-2020 (Redevelopment including the demolition of the existing building and the erection of a new building ranging between 1 and 6 storeys to provide a 302-bedroom hotel (Use Class C1)with basement and ancillary facilities including restaurant, car parking, coach parking, hard and soft landscaping and associated works).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details fail to safeguard the amenity of surrounding areas and manage highways impacts in accordance with Policies DMHB 11, DMT 2 and DMEI 14 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (2020).
